154.heading: Hardwick, Gary.
154.title: Spawn [videorecording]
154.author: [No author]
notes: Special edited ed.
1 videocassette (90 mins.) : sd., col. ; 1/2 in.
PG-13 version.

Summary (from OCLC): Animated tale of a man now a "hell-spawn," battling the forces of evil on Earth and in himself. Using his strange powers, he fights to uncover the truth about his identity and fulfill his destiny.
Created by Todd McFarlane ; written by Alan McElroy, Gary Hardwick ; executive producers, Todd McFarlane and Alan McElroy.
